desc: Virtual course about Coffee Cultural Landscape that was declared a World Heritage Site for UNESCO in 2011. The course was made for the Colombian Coffee Growers Federation, and the users are coffee growers, hotel or restaurant owners living and woring in this area. It was developed using HTML/CSS/jQuery mainly and Adobe Flash in certain resources.
rol: Project manager, interaction designer, jQuery/JavaScript developer.
req: a display wider than 800px,Adobe Flash Player
